scripts.network: hc s clean && npm run build:happ && concurrently "npm run build:watch -w ui" "npm run launch:happ" "npm run playground"
scripts.test: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive && npm t -w tests
scripts.launch:happ: echo "pass" | RUST_LOG=warn hc launch --piped -n $AGENTS workdir/herddit.happ -w --ui-path ui/dist network mdns
scripts.package: npm run build:happ && npm run package -w ui && hc web-app pack workdir --recursive
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive
